thread.title: Shopify adds New York headquarters to U.S. regulatory filing for first time
thread.title_full: Shopify adds New York headquarters to U.S. regulatory filing for first time

author: Barbara Shecter
title: Shopify adds New York headquarters to U.S. regulatory filing for first time
text:
Shopify Inc. has listed a U.S. headquarters alongside its home base in Ottawa for the first time in an annual regulatory filing. Read more. This advertisement has not loaded yet, but your article continues below.
Shopify adds New York headquarters to U.S. regulatory filing for first time Filing intended to 'align our disclosures more closely with other software peers,' company says, but analyst suspects index inclusion a possible motivation Get the latest from Barbara Shecter straight to your inbox Sign Up Photo by David Kawai/Bloomberg
Article content Canadian tech giant Shopify Inc. has listed a U.S. headquarters alongside its home base in Ottawa for the first time in an annual regulatory filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.
Article content We apologize, but this video has failed to load.

tap here to see other videos from our team. Try refreshing your browser, or Play Video
Article content A spokesperson said the filing was made to more closely align the company with its software peers but did not directly answer a question about whether Shopify had considered a more formal move south.
